imdb.title: Director's Short Cut
synopsis:
In "Director's Short Cut" you get the most fascinating stories and best anecdotes from the greatest directors, within 4 minutes fillers.
1 Joel Schumacher - "Falling Down", "Phantom of the Opera" and "Phone Booth"
2 Joel Schumacher - On Set
3 Joel Schumacher - Directing Actors
4 Richard Donner - Being attached to "The Omen" and "Superman"
5 Richard Donner - And Gregory Peck

9 Andrew Davis - "The Fugitive"

13 William Friedkin - The Making of "The French Connection"
